Applied Blockchain | Backend Developer | London - Canary Wharf | ONSITE | https://appliedblockchain.com

About Applied Blockchain: Applied Blockchain is an innovative applications development company, focusing on distributed ledger technology and smart contracts. Based in London at Level39 Fintech hub in Canary Wharf, Applied Blockchain has an expert team of blockchain developers that have been building cutting-edge solutions for disruptive startups and corporate clients in banking and finance, e-payments, energy trading, aviation, telecommunications and social impact sectors. We are building a new generation of decentralised applications, working through some of the most interesting problems in this field such as KYC, identity management, transactions anonymity, encryption and data security.

Have a look at our job openings here: https://appliedblockchain.com/careers/
